messages.title: My Priorities for Rochester and Strood

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Medway voted to leave the EU and I have consistently voted to deliver Brexit. It is important to get this done so we can move on with our positive and ambitious agenda.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: INVESTING IN OUR POLICE, HEALTHCARE AND THE ENVIRONMENT
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will increase the support for our police officers to keep our streets safe, and I am committed to securing improved access to GPs and mental health provision. We are also delivering on our commitment to Net Zero emissions by 2050.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: IMPROVING INFRASTRUCTURE AND THE LOCAL ECONOMY
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We are supporting a strong local economy by enabling business growth, increased earnings and rights for working people. I am determined to ensure that new development provides the services local people need.

mentions.tacticalSituation: ONLY A MAJORITY GOVERNMENT CAN GET ON WITH THE COUNTRY’S PRIORITIES. John Curtice: Polls teeter between hung parliament and slim Tory majority.

issues.brexitEurope: Medway voted to leave the EU and I have consistently voted to deliver Brexit. It is important to get this done so we can move on with our positive and ambitious agenda.
issues.economy: We are supporting a strong local economy by enabling business growth, increased earnings and rights for working people.
issues.education: English schools to get three-year £14bn funding boost.
issues.environment: We are also delivering on our commitment to Net Zero emissions by 2050.
issues.government: ONLY A MAJORITY GOVERNMENT CAN GET ON WITH THE COUNTRY’S PRIORITIES.
issues.health: I am committed to securing improved access to GPs and mental health provision. Government plans billions for hospital projects. Better hospitals.
issues.lawCrime: We will increase the support for our police officers to keep our streets safe. End of the soft prison sentence.

community.content: I am determined to ensure that new development provides the services local people need.

contactInformation.address: Alex Hynes, on behalf of Kelly Tolhurst, both of: Bellgrace House, 102 Waterside Court High Street, Rochester, ME1 1FD.
